description: A combination of slim-line design and functionality make this sleeve a perfect solution for the netbook user on the go. An ultra-padded exterior and sueded interior offer complete protection for your 7-10" netbook. Place your battery, USB drive or other accessories in the asymmetrical zippered front pocket so you never leave anything behind.
title: Case Logic PLS-210 10-Inch Neoprene Netbook Sleeve (Blue)
